techmeme.title: US v. Google: a judge bars Google from paying to be the exclusive search engine on devices and browsers but allows it to make payments for product distribution (Wall Street Journal)
US v. Google: a federal judge rules that Google will not be required to divest Chrome or Android but must share search data; GOOG jumps 8%+ after hours (Jennifer Elias/CNBC)
Cloudflare says attackers gained access to a Salesforce instance it uses for internal customer case management, as part of the Salesloft Drift breach (Sergiu Gatlan/BleepingComputer)
OpenAI CPO Kevin Weil will become VP of a new group called OpenAI for Science to build an "AI-powered platform that accelerates scientific discovery" (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
Apple's lead AI researcher for robotics, Jian Zhang, has left for Meta's Robotics Studio; sources: three more researchers left Apple's Foundation Models team (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
